meanings.definition: Not attracting attention or interest; ordinary or unremarkable.
meanings.sent1: The movie was unspectacular, just like any other film we've seen.
meanings.sent2: Her unspectacular outfit blended in with the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The unspectacular sandwich he made was so plain, it disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The unspectacular sunset painted the sky in muted colors.
meanings.sent5: The unspectacular room had plain white walls and a simple bed.

meanings.sent1: The cake was unspectacular, with no fancy decorations.
meanings.sent2: His unspectacular performance failed to impress the judges.
meanings.sent3: The unspectacular magic trick left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: The unspectacular flower garden paled in comparison to the vibrant one next door.
meanings.sent5: The unspectacular fireworks display fizzled out quickly.
